headline: TJX (TJX) Valuation Check After Strong 3-Month and 1-Year Share Price Gains
summary: TJX Companies (TJX) has quietly outpaced many retail peers this year, with the stock up about 11% over the past 3 months and roughly 28% over the past year. See our latest analysis for TJX Companies. That steady climb in the share price, which now sits around $154.6, has come alongside a 27.61 percent year to date share price return and a powerful three year total shareholder return of 102.71 percent. This suggests momentum is still very much on TJX’s side. If TJX’s run has you thinking about...
